alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 04 at 12:02PM PDT until August 04 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Inyo County in south central California... * Until 330 PM PDT. * At 1202 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the Coso Range Wilderness Area as well as between Olancha and Panamint Springs. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly and may impact Highway 190. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Keeler and Darwin and Highway 190 between Olancha and Panamint Springs. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
